title: Sandy Beach: Modeling rates part - d

content.question: For <math> <semantics> <mrow> <mn>0</mn><mo>≤</mo><mi>t</mi><mo>≤</mo><mn>6</mn> </mrow> <annotation encoding="MathType-MTEF">MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3BF1@</annotation> </semantics> </math>, at what time t is the amount of sand on the beach a minimum? What is the minimum value? Justify your answers.

topic.text: 5.5: Using the Candidates Test to Determine Absolute (Global) Extrema
